sentences.en: After more misses, they finally put two arrows into the lion's chest.
sentences.cn: 又射偏了几次之后,他们终于把两支箭射入了狮子的胸膛.

sentences.en: After several delays we finally took off at six o’clock.
sentences.cn: 几经耽搁后，我们终于在六点起飞了。

sentences.en: After some technical hitches the show finally got under way.
sentences.cn: 一些小技术故障解决后，演出终于开始了。

sentences.en: Finally, after ten hours of negotiations, the gunman gave himself up.
sentences.cn: 经过10个小时的谈判，持枪歹徒终于投降了。

sentences.en: Finally, Karpov cracked under the pressure.
sentences.cn: 最后，卡尔波夫承受不住压力崩溃了。

sentences.en: Finally, late in life and against considerable odds, she became a nun.
sentences.cn: 她排除极大困难，最终在晚年成为了一名修女。

sentences.en: Finally, trying to respect her wishes, I said I'd leave.
sentences.cn: 最后，为了尊重她的意愿，我说我会离开。

sentences.en: He finally admitted that his film career was kaput.
sentences.cn: 他最终承认他的电影生涯走到尽头了。

sentences.en: He finally corrected his misstatement and offered to reduce the fee.
sentences.cn: 他终于纠正了自己的错误说法，提出要减少费用。

sentences.en: He finally faltered in the last game of a heroic match.
sentences.cn: 他在这场艰苦比赛的最后一局中踉跄结束。

sentences.en: His mind was in a fog when he finally got up.
sentences.cn: 他终于起床了，头脑一片混沌。

sentences.en: I finally hoisted him up with a block and tackle.
sentences.cn: 我最终用滑轮组把他拉了上去。

sentences.en: I finally succeeded in packing her off to bed.
sentences.cn: 最后我总算是把她打发上床睡觉了。

sentences.en: Several long-awaited videos will finally arrive in the shops this month.
sentences.cn: 几部让人翘首企盼的录像片终于将在这个月到货。

sentences.en: She finally broke into films after an acclaimed stage career.
sentences.cn: 她在取得舞台生涯的成功后，最终进入电影界发展。

sentences.en: The dentist commenced to dig, drill and finally fill the offending tooth.
sentences.cn: 牙医开始在那颗有问题的牙齿上挖洞，钻孔，直到最后把它补好。

sentences.en: We waited till twelve and we finally got on the plane.
sentences.cn: 我们一直等到12点才终于上了飞机。

words.tran_cn: 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的
决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版
结局；终曲；最后一场；最后乐章；尾声
定局；终结；结尾；最后的事物；最后的言行
